title: Program for Improving Mathematical Concept Understanding through Web-Based Spaced Repetition Vocabulary Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Comprehension of Mathematical Terminology and Basic Smartphone Usage Skills
context.additional_context: A curriculum combining vocabulary learning with real-world project application, aimed at solving math problems encountered in daily life

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain 200 basic math-related vocabulary items with 80% accuracy six months later
Learners achieve a long-term retention rate of over 70% for target vocabulary over 12 weeks using a spaced repetition system
Learners enhance their ability to apply vocabulary acquired through project-based activities to real-world problem-solving

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
